description: Execute the 3 immediate next steps: merge checkpoint branch, create GitHub issues for deferred features, and create results summary for sharing

userStories.title: Merge checkpoint-robustness branch to main
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want to merge the checkpoint-robustness feature branch to main so that the improvements are available in the main branch
acceptanceCriteria: Verify merge completed successfully with git log

userStories.title: Create GitHub issues for deferred features
userStories.description: As a project manager, I want GitHub issues created for retry logic and progress streaming so that these deferred features are tracked for v1.5.0
acceptanceCriteria: Create issue #1: Implement retry logic with exponential backoff (include 3 user stories from prds/retry-logic.json)
Create issue #2: Implement real-time progress streaming (include 3 user stories from prds/progress-streaming.json)
Both issues tagged with milestone v1.5.0
Both issues include time estimates (3-4h for retry, 2-3h for streaming)
Both issues reference the 8-hour battle plan results

userStories.title: Create shareable results summary
userStories.description: As a communicator, I want a concise shareable summary document so that the meta-improvement results can be easily shared with the team/community
acceptanceCriteria: Create SHARE_RESULTS.md with 2-3 page executive summary
Include: mission overview, key achievements, metrics, learnings
Add visual elements (tables, bullet points, emojis for readability)
Keep it accessible for non-technical stakeholders
Add call-to-action (try v1.4.0, provide feedback, contribute)
